titlesProper.title: Proper titles
titlesProper.description: Uniform title, a related or an analytical title that is controlled by an authority file or list, used as an added access point.

translatedFrom.title: Translated from
translatedFrom.description: Language from which a resource is translated.

authors.title: Authors
authors.description: Author(s) of the resource. Can be either persons or organisations.

date.title: Date
date.description: Information about the birth and the death of a person. Helpful to disambiguate people.

qualifier.title: Qualifier
qualifier.description: Information about the person, ie her profession. Helpful to disambiguate people.

items.title: Statement
items.description: Statement of place and agent of the provision activity.

startDate.title: Start date of publication
startDate.description: Start date of the publication. This must be an integer, ie 1989, 453, -50. Used to sort search results. Once this field is set, a free formed date of publication can be added in the next field.

endDate.title: End date of publication
endDate.description: End date of the publication. This must be an integer, ie 1989, 453, -50. Used to sort search results. Once this field is set, a free formed date of publication can be added in the next field.

illustrativeContent.title: Illustrative content
illustrativeContent.description: Record every different illustrative content in a new field. Use one or more RDA recommended terms, in the singular or plural (MARC 300$b).

form.placeholder: RDA recommended terms: illustrations, maps, photographs, portraits, ...

extent.title: Extent
extent.description: Record the number of units and the type of unit. For the type of unit, use RDA recommended terms.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: A playing time, performance time, running time, etc., of the content of an expression.

colorContent.title: Colour content
colorContent.description: A presence of colour, tone, etc., in the content of an expression. Record a colour content if considered important for identification or selection.

productionMethod.title: Production method
productionMethod.description: Process used to produce a manifestation.

bookFormat.title: Bibliographic format
bookFormat.description: A proportional relationship between a whole sheet in a printed or manuscript resource, and the individual leaves that result if that sheet is left full, cut, or folded.

dimensions.title: Dimensions
dimensions.description: Dimensions include measurements of height, width, depth, length, gauge, and diameter. For oblong volumes, record the height × width.

series.title: Series
series.description: Series to which belongs the resource.

items.title: Series
items.description: Series to which belongs the resource.

number.title: Numbering
number.description: Numbering of the resource within the series.

electronicLocator.title: Electronic locations
electronicLocator.description: Information needed to locate and access an electronic resource.

content.title: Content type
content.description: Is displayed as the text of the link.

publicNote.title: Public note
publicNote.description: Is displayed next to the link, as additional information.

form.placeholder: Example: Access only from the library

harvested.title: Harvested
harvested.description: Document is harvested or not, will disable record edition or similar.
